sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM msProteinInferPeptide as pep, IDPickerPeptide as idpPep WHERE pep.id=#id# AND pep.id = idpPep.piPeptideID

SELECT p.id, p.sequence, idpPep.groupID FROM msProteinInferPeptide as p, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch as protMatch, IDPickerPeptide as idpPep WHERE p.id = protMatch.piPeptideID AND protMatch.piProteinID = #id# AND p.id = idpPep.piPeptideID

SELECT DISTINCT ipept.piPeptideID FROM IDPickerProtein AS iprot, msProteinInferProtein AS prot, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch AS m, IDPickerPeptide AS ipept WHERE iprot.piProteinID= prot.id AND prot.id = m.piProteinID AND m.piPeptideID = ipept.piPeptideID AND iprot.groupID=#proteinGroupId# AND prot.piRunID=#pinferId#;

SELECT pep.*, idpPep.* FROM msProteinInferProtein prot, msProteinInferPeptide as pep, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch as mtch, IDPickerPeptide as idpPep WHERE prot.piRunID=#id# AND prot.id = mtch.piProteinID AND mtch.piPeptideID = pep.id AND pep.id = idpPep.piPeptideID GROUP BY piPeptideID

SELECT pep.*, idpPep.* FROM msProteinInferProtein prot, msProteinInferPeptide as pep, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch as mtch, IDPickerPeptide as idpPep WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = mtch.piProteinID AND mtch.piPeptideID = pep.id AND pep.id = idpPep.piPeptideID AND idpPep.groupID=#groupId# GROUP BY piPeptideID
SELECT proteinGroupID FROM IDPickerGroupAssociation WHERE piRunID=#pinferId# AND peptideGroupID=#groupId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO IDPickerPeptide ( piPeptideID, groupID) VALUES (?,?)
INSERT INTO IDPickerGroupAssociation ( piRunID, proteinGroupID, peptideGroupID) VALUES (#protGrpId#, #peptGrpId#)
